Name: Fears to Fathom - Home Alone
About the game: Fears to Fathom is an episodic psychological horror game where each episode unveils a short story narrated by the ones who survived. The first episode of Fears to Fathom is free to play, more episodes are coming soon. Fears to Fathom : Home Alone In the first episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Miles, a 14 years old kid who is home alone while his parents are out of town for work. He soon finds himself in trouble as the story unfolds, would he make it through the night? He survived as he made the right choices . Key Features Atmospheric environment and photo-realistic graphics. VHS film aesthetic. Receive texts from NPCs. Player voice activity.
